attributes.action: build more council properties for disabled people i like others want a good quality of life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: but i can not expect my parents to adapt their home for me i am on the housing list but still no joy why cant disabled people have the life others have give us equal opertunities to stand on our own and be counted get more disabled adapted council properties built instead of keep letting in immigrants take care of who is here already that dont have a great quality of life right now be fair more disabled adapted properties now
